articles.title: ‘I transitioned to be happy’: Lia Thomas breaks silence, reveals Olympic goal - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: American swimmer Lia Thomas has spoken for the first time since becoming the first transgender athlete to win an NCAA title, saying her next goal is the Olympic trials.
articles.content:

articles.title: Rising gas prices and inflation top travel concerns, overtaking Covid, survey finds - CNBC
articles.description: Most Americans plan to travel this summer, but rising gas prices and inflation now top their list of concerns, overtaking Covid.
articles.content:
After more than two years of largely staying home due to the pandemic, most Americans are ready to hit the road.
